description: Inspired by a vintage piece, this jacket is crafted from soft shearling and finished with sustainably produced leather patches.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 26½" front body length, a 25½" back body length, a 20¼" shoulder, a 45" chest, and a 35" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes 1" between sizes.
Point collar. Snapped closure at each collar point. Adjustable buckled straps at the collar. "R.L." debossed at the top collar strap. Full-zip front.
Long sleeves with leather patches and zip cuffs. Ventilating metal grommets at the underarms.
Two front waist leather patch pockets. Adjustable buckled tabs at the waist. Allover leather trim. Unlined.
By purchasing this product, you are supporting sustainable leather manufacturing through the Leather Working Group.
Visit corporate.RalphLauren.com/citizenship-create-timeless-style for more information on Ralph Lauren's sustainability initiatives.
Shell: shearling. Patches and trim: leather. Interior sleeve gussets: nylon. Dry clean by a leather and shearling specialist. Imported. Shearling origin: Iceland.
Due to the natural characteristics of this material, the coloring may rub off onto fabrics and upholstery.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size medium.
